mapper.insert: INSERT INTO rdc_return_data ( `id`, `header_id`, `detail_id`, `ctn_code`, `product_id`, `batch_code`, `scan_code`, `scan_by`, `scan_time`, `qty`, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{header_id}, #{detail_id}, #{ctn_code}, #{product_id}, #{batch_code}, #{scan_code}, #{scan_by}, #{scan_time}, #{qty}, #{createBy}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
